mfa.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
mfa.mfaIs: Multi-factor authentication is the practice of requiring multiple factors to confirm your identity. Factors may include something you know, such as a password, something you have, such as a unique code sent to a mobile device, or something you are, such as your fingerprint.
mfa.imiportantBecause: Traditional passwords are vulnerable to attacks such as brute force or credential stuffing. With well-implemented MFA, these weaknesses are mitigating by requiring a second alternative authentication method alongside the password.
mfa.whatIsTOTP: What is a Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP)?
mfa.totpIs: A common type of multi-factor authentication is the Time-based One-Time Password, an algorithmically generated, time sensitive code that can be accessed via an app on a person's smartphone.
mfa.whatAppsSupported: What authentication applications are supported to access the CyQu portal?
mfa.supportedApps: We recommend Google Authenticator, Okta Verify, Authy or your preferred password manager app.

ubp.UXDescription: By using an out-of-date browser, you may not be able to access all the content and features that are available.
ubp.copyright: Aon plc or its affiliates (Aon). All rights reserved.
ubp.notAbleToUpdate: What if I'm not able to update my browser?
ubp.notAbletoUpdateDescription: If you are not able to install or remove software on your computer due to your organization's IT policies, please contact your IT administration, and ask for an up-to-date web browser.
ubp.performanceDescription: Current web browsers are faster, more usable, and more stable.
ubp.pleaseUpdateLongVersion: If you are using an out-of-date web browser, please upgrade your browser to one of these free and up-to-date options.
ubp.securityDescription: Older web browsers may have security defects that render them vulnerable to viruses and other forms of attacks.
ubp.threeReasons: Three common reasons why you should update your web browser:
ubp.title: Update Browser | Aon
ubp.whyUpdate: Why do I need to update?
